sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: PETZ - Tdh Hldgs Inc Latest Stock News & Market Updates
feed.summary: This page provides dedicated news and market updates for TDH Holdings, Inc. (NASDAQ: PETZ), focusing on its transition from pet food manufacturing and restaurant operations to commercial real estate management. The article highlights recent financial results, including revenue growth in commercial real estate, changes in operating segments, and information regarding annual general meetings. It also includes financial summaries and sentiment analyses from Rhea-AI for various past news releases.

feed.title: Pan American Silver Corp. (TSE:PAAS) Plans Dividend Increase - $0.18 Per Share
feed.summary: Pan American Silver Corp. (TSE:PAAS) has announced a significant increase in its quarterly dividend to $0.18 per share, up 28.6% from the previous $0.14. The dividend, representing an annualized yield of 0.8%, will be distributed to shareholders of record on March 13th, with the ex-dividend date set for March 2nd. Despite reporting a negative net margin and return on equity in its latest earnings, the company's stock shows strong market performance with a 52-week high of C$95.39 and analysts expecting C$1.9192235 EPS for the current fiscal year.

feed.title: PAYH | TrueShares S&P Autocallable High Insider Trading

It notes the absence of recent Congressional trading, insider trading, corporate lobbying, and new patent grants for PAYH. The article also includes details on institutional ownership, derivatives, analyst ratings, and a "Smart Score" based on Quiver's proprietary data.

feed.title: PG&E Deploys ABB DC Fast Chargers To Electrify Its Fleet
feed.summary: PG&E is partnering with ABB E-mobility to electrify its fleet of 9,500 vehicles, aiming to electrify 4,300 by 2030. ABB has supplied both 50 kW compact chargers for overnight charging and 400 kW All-In-One chargers for mission-critical vehicles requiring faster charging. This initiative positions PG&E, one of the largest US utilities, as a leader in EV adoption and expands its business opportunities.

feed.title: Oxford Lane Capital stock hits 52-week low at 10.8 USD
feed.summary: Oxford Lane Capital Corp (OXLC) stock has hit a 52-week low of $10.82, currently trading slightly above this at $10.84. This decline marks a significant 42.96% drop over the past year, reflecting market challenges. Despite recent struggles and a notable decrease in its net asset value per share in Q3 2025, the company maintains a strong 21.6% dividend yield and has consistently paid dividends for 16 years.

feed.title: OPEX Stock Fund Price and Chart — CBOE:OPEX

(OPEN) through swap agreements and other financial instruments. The fund has assets under management of $16.83 million USD and an expense ratio of 1.30%. feed.title: Opendoor Technologies Experiences Revision in Stock Score Amid Mixed Financial Indicators
feed.summary: Opendoor Technologies (Opendoor Technologies, Inc.) has seen a revision in its stock score due to mixed financial indicators, including a net loss of USD -250 million for the half-year. Despite profitability challenges, the company showed positive signs like reduced raw material costs and improved inventory and debtor turnover ratios. Its stock has outperformed the S&P 500 over the past year but remains negative year-to-date, highlighting its volatile market position.

feed.title: Ocular Therapeutix, Inc. (OCUL): A Bull Case Theory
feed.summary: This article summarizes a bullish thesis on Ocular Therapeutix, Inc. (OCUL) from r/Valueinvesting, focusing on potential acquisition by Sanofi due to its need for a new growth driver as Dupixent's exclusivity ends. OCUL's pipeline, especially for wet AMD and diabetic eye disease, makes it a valuable target, with rumors suggesting a bid of around $30 per share. Upcoming top-line results are expected to be a key catalyst, potentially leading to significant investor returns through acquisition or continued development of its ocular therapies.

feed.title: OBK SEC Filings - Origin Bancorp 10-K, 10-Q, 8-K Forms
feed.summary: This page provides a comprehensive resource for Origin Bancorp (OBK) SEC filings, including 10-K annual reports, 10-Q quarterly earnings, 8-K material events, and insider trading forms. It highlights the company's financial condition, operational results, and significant events, with AI-powered summaries of lengthy documents. Recent filings detail insider transactions, exposure to Tricolor-tied mortgages, Q3 2025 earnings announcements, and a director's resignation linked to Tricolor's bankruptcy.

feed.title: Key facts: Blackstone reports $14.45B revenue; CEO earns $1.2B; plans AI firm
feed.summary: Blackstone Inc. reported a 9% rise in annual revenue, reaching $14.45 billion, largely due to increased management fees and investment income. CEO Steve Schwarzman earned over $1.2 billion, primarily from dividends on his company stake, despite a slight drop in share performance. The company also announced plans to form a public entity focused on acquiring AI data centers to capitalize on the growing demand for AI infrastructure.

feed.title: Johnson Controls (JCI) Expands Data Center Cooling Capabilities with Alloy Enterprises Acquisition
feed.summary: Johnson Controls (JCI) is set to acquire Alloy Enterprises, a company specializing in advanced thermal management platforms for high-performance data centers. This acquisition will bolster Johnson Controls' presence in the rapidly expanding data center cooling market by integrating Alloy's proprietary liquid cooling technology, which can improve thermal management efficiency by up to 35%. The move aligns with JCI's strategy to expand its thermal management portfolio and deliver differentiated cooling solutions.

feed.title: TJX Outlook Remains Solid as Baird Updates Model after Earnings Report
feed.summary: Baird has updated its model for The TJX Companies, Inc. (NYSE:TJX) after the company reported strong Q4 results, raising its price objective to $172 from $168 and reiterating an Outperform rating. TJX exceeded expectations across all four operating divisions, with annual sales surpassing $60 billion for the first time. The off-price retailer's model, which involves selling discounted inventory from well-known brands, continues to resonate with value-focused shoppers.

feed.title: GeoVax vaccine data included in HIV-therapy presentation at CROI 2023
feed.summary: GeoVax Labs, Inc. announced the presentation of clinical study results at CROI 2023, showcasing data on a combinational HIV therapy including their MVA62B vaccine candidate. The study, led by the University of California, San Francisco, aimed to achieve a "functional cure" by reducing or eliminating viral replication without antiviral medications. The data indicated high levels of immunogenicity and positive impacts on viral rebound kinetics, with GeoVax's MVA-vectored HIV vaccine contributing to these favorable findings.

feed.title: Amgen Recasts Growth Story With Product Momentum And Long Dated Funding
feed.summary: Amgen is shifting its focus towards growth leadership, driven by strong product momentum from drugs like Repatha and the anticipation of Phase 3 data for its obesity drug candidate, MariTide. To support this growth, the company recently issued a US$4.0 billion multi-tranche bond extending to 2056, providing long-term capital for pipeline investments and business development. This strategic move aims to reshape how Amgen is perceived within the large-cap biotech sector, balancing growth ambitions with traditional financial stability and dividend payouts.

feed.title: Waste Management (WM) Gets Higher CIBC Target as Operational Momentum Builds
feed.summary: CIBC raised its price target for Waste Management (WM) to $242 from $231, reiterating a Neutral rating due to the company's operational momentum. The increase follows discussions with management regarding volume, pricing, WM Healthcare, technology use, and free cash flow priorities. CEO James Fish highlighted a strong 2025 with record operating efficiency, double-digit operating cash flow growth, and significant free cash flow increase, driven by core business performance, Healthcare Solutions integration, and sustainability expansions.

feed.title: Stryker (SYK) Sees Higher Price Target from UBS amid Continued MedTech Strength
feed.summary: UBS has increased its price target for Stryker Corporation (NYSE: SYK) to $400 from $386, while maintaining a Neutral rating. This adjustment comes after Stryker reported strong financial results for Q4 2025 and the full year, with organic sales growing significantly across multiple business segments and total revenue exceeding $25 billion. CEO Kevin Lobo highlighted the company's strategic initiatives, including the formation of the SmartCare business unit and a new breast care sales team, all contributing to its continued strength in the medical technology sector.

feed.title: Mizuho Adjusts Willis Towers Watson (WTW) Target While Keeping Bullish Rating
feed.summary: Mizuho analyst Yaron Kinar lowered the price target for Willis Towers Watson (WTW) to $358 from $392, while maintaining an Outperform rating. The adjustment reflects an updated outlook for insurance property and casualty companies after a sector selloff, with the analyst noting that AI poses a low disruption threat to brokerage firms serving middle-market and larger clients. Additionally, Willis Towers Watson's Board of Directors approved a 4% increase in the regular quarterly cash dividend to $0.96 per common share, payable on April 15, 2026.

feed.title: PETS Financials: Income Statement, Balance Sheet & Cash Flow
feed.summary: Petmed Express Inc (PETS) reported a significant decline in revenue and remains unprofitable in fiscal year 2025, with revenue down 17.2% to $227.0M and a net loss of $6.3M. The company's financial health score is low at 23/100, though it maintains adequate liquidity and a conservative debt-to-equity ratio. Key metrics like free cash flow and earnings per share also show negative results, highlighting ongoing financial challenges despite some operational improvements.

feed.title: Pacific Biosciences of California backs San Diego event to strengthen rare disease awareness
feed.summary: Pacific Biosciences of California is sponsoring San Diego’s Rare Disease Day event to advance research and awareness for rare diseases. The company is collaborating with families, healthcare providers, researchers, and advocates to highlight patient stories and scientific progress. This sponsorship aims to bring attention to the challenges faced by the rare disease community and encourage continued scientific engagement.

feed.title: Second HeLa Lawsuit Resolved As Novartis Reaches Confidential Settlement
feed.summary: Novartis has reached a confidential settlement with the family of Henrietta Lacks regarding the unauthorized use of her cells in medical research. This agreement marks the second such resolution, following a settlement with Thermo Fisher Scientific in 2023. The family had filed a lawsuit arguing that companies profited from Lacks' cells, which were taken without consent in 1951 and became the famous "HeLa" cell line, crucial for advancing vaccine and disease research.

feed.title: Home Depot (HD) Price Target Raised as Performance Remains Steady
feed.summary: Telsey Advisory has raised its price target for Home Depot (HD) to $435 from $410, reiterating an Outperform rating due to the company's consistent performance and market share gains despite a challenging macro environment. The company recently reported better-than-expected quarterly earnings, driven by strong demand from professional contractors and smaller repair projects, and has utilized AI-powered tools and selective price increases to support its growth.

feed.title: PPL Gets Upgrade from Barclays on Improving Earnings Visibility
feed.summary: Barclays upgraded PPL Corporation (NYSE: PPL) to Overweight with a raised price target of $40, citing improving earnings visibility and a favorable Pennsylvania rate case. The company reported strong Q4 2025 results, with ongoing earnings up 7.1% year-over-year, and projects 7.2% earnings growth for 2026. PPL also plans to invest $23 billion in capital projects by 2029 to strengthen its grid and expand generation capacity.

feed.title: ROSEN, SKILLED INVESTOR COUNSEL, Encourages Enphase Energy, Inc. Investors with Losses in ...
feed.summary: Rosen Law Firm is reminding purchasers of Enphase Energy, Inc. (NASDAQ: ENPH) securities who incurred losses between April 22, 2025, and October 28, 2025, that they have until April 20, 2026, to move for lead plaintiff. The lawsuit alleges that Enphase made false and misleading statements regarding its ability to manage inventory and mitigate effects from the termination of the Residential Clean Energy Credit. Investors affected by these alleged misrepresentations are encouraged to contact the firm for more information.

feed.title: Key facts: NextNav appoints Lisa Hook as Lead Independent Director; price target set at $20.00
feed.summary: NextNav Inc. has announced the appointment of Lisa Hook as Lead Independent Director, effective February 24, 2026. Analysts have set a 12-month price target for NextNav at $20.00, representing an 18.2% increase from its last closing price of $16.92, with earnings estimates remaining stable over the past three months.

feed.title: Walmart (WMT) Coverage Reinstated With Bullish Outlook from BofA
feed.summary: BofA has reinstated coverage of Walmart Inc. (WMT) with a "Buy" rating and a $150 price target, citing the company's ability to gain market share among both high-income consumers with fast delivery and lower-income shoppers through its everyday low pricing strategy. The analyst anticipates steady sales growth and faster profit expansion, potentially leading to upward revisions in earnings estimates and a higher stock valuation. This positive outlook comes despite a recent $100 million settlement by Walmart with the FTC and 11 states over allegations of misleading delivery drivers about their earnings and tips in its Spark Driver program.

feed.title: Nutanix (NTNX) Profitability Run With US$103 Million Q2 Net Income Tests Bearish Narratives
feed.summary: Nutanix (NTNX) recently reported strong Q2 2026 results with a net income of US$103 million, challenging bearish narratives. The company has shifted from net losses to significant profitability, with trailing twelve-month revenue of US$2.7 billion and basic EPS of US$0.99. Despite a high P/E ratio compared to the industry and negative shareholders' equity, bulls argue the company's projected growth and DCF valuation suggest undervaluation, while bears focus on balance sheet risks.

feed.title: BofA Cuts Domino's (DPZ) Target to $545 While Keeping Bullish Rating
feed.summary: BofA has lowered its price target for Domino's Pizza (DPZ) to $545 from $556, while maintaining a "Buy" rating. The adjustment follows a review of the company's Q4 2025 earnings, which saw the analyst reduce its fiscal year EPS forecast due to a higher expected tax rate. Domino's CEO expressed confidence in the pizza market's resilience and the company's potential to double US retail sales over time.

feed.title: Revvity (RVTY) Valuation Check After Recent Share Price Weakness
feed.summary: This article evaluates Revvity (RVTY) after a recent share price decline, using two main valuation approaches. A Discounted Cash Flow (DCF) analysis suggests Revvity is undervalued by 29.7%, estimating an intrinsic value of $139.75 per share against a current price of $98.31. Conversely, a Price-to-Earnings (P/E) ratio comparison indicates the stock is overvalued, trading at 45.8x P/E compared to a "Fair Ratio" of 24.9x.

feed.title: Sherwin-Williams Extends 47-Year Dividend Streak As Income Story Evolves
feed.summary: Sherwin-Williams (NYSE:SHW) has announced its 47th consecutive annual dividend increase to $0.80 per share, highlighting its ongoing commitment to shareholder returns. This strong dividend history signals consistent cash generation, even as the stock has underperformed some basic materials peers. Investors should consider the company's debt levels and its ability to balance dividends with growth investments, alongside its projected 8.31% annual earnings growth.

feed.title: A Look At Northwest Natural Holding (NWN) Valuation As Shares Track Recent Price Momentum
feed.summary: Northwest Natural Holding (NWN) has drawn investor attention due to recent positive share price movements and steady financial figures. Currently trading at $53.04, it is considered slightly undervalued with a narrative fair value of $54.33, primarily based on long-term growth and capital investment assumptions. However, its P/E ratio of 19.4x is above the gas utilities average, suggesting less room for error.

feed.title: Top 10 Largest Defence Companies in the World
feed.summary: This article ranks the top 10 largest defense companies in the world for 2025 based on their 2024 defense-specific revenues, highlighting their contributions to global security. Lockheed Martin retains the top spot, followed by RTX and China Aerospace Science and Industry Corporation (CASIC), showcasing the significant growth of Chinese firms and Europe's renewed focus on defense. The global defense landscape is shaped by technological innovation, geopolitical tensions, and major modernization programs across various domains.

feed.title: ROSEN, SKILLED INVESTOR COUNSEL, Encourages Enphase Energy, Inc. Investors with Losses in Excess of $100K to Secure Counsel Before Important Deadline in Securities Class Action – ENPH
feed.summary: Rosen Law Firm is encouraging investors of Enphase Energy, Inc. (NASDAQ: ENPH) who suffered losses exceeding $100,000 to secure legal counsel before the April 20, 2026, lead plaintiff deadline for a securities class action lawsuit. The lawsuit alleges that Enphase overstated its ability to manage channel inventory and mitigate the effects of terminating the Residential Clean Energy Credit, leading to materially false and misleading public statements. Investors who purchased Enphase securities between April 22, 2025, and October 28, 2025, are eligible to join the class action.

feed.title: Should Olaplex’s Faster No.3PLUS Launch Prompt Rethinking of Its Science-Led Brand Strategy (OLPX)?
feed.summary: Olaplex Holdings (OLPX) recently launched No.3PLUS Complete Repair Treatment, a faster version of its bond-building product, aiming to rejuvenate its science-led brand amidst revenue and earnings pressure. While the new product broadens its core franchise, it does not fully address channel weakness or margin pressure. Investors are keenly awaiting the upcoming earnings release on March 5, 2026, for insights into the impact of new launches and marketing efforts on sales and profitability.

feed.title: UDR Inc Stock: Why Apartment REIT Investors Are Repricing Risk Now
feed.summary: UDR Inc, an apartment REIT, is experiencing a repricing of risk by investors, driven by the U.S. apartment market's resilience and the Federal Reserve's interest rate policy. The article examines UDR's operations, balance sheet, and valuation, highlighting its shift from a high-growth phase to a more mature, rate-sensitive carry trade. For U.S. investors, UDR offers exposure to multifamily real estate, acting as a bond proxy with rent growth potential, appealing to income-oriented investors with a long-term horizon.

feed.title: Jim Cramer on Universal Display: "There Is Going to Come a Time When We Should Recommend This Stock, but That Time Is Not Yet Here"
feed.summary: Jim Cramer commented on Universal Display Corporation (NASDAQ: OLED), stating that while there will be a time to recommend the stock, "that time is not yet here." The company reported Q4 2025 GAAP EPS of $1.39 and full-year 2025 revenues of $650.6 million, with 2026 revenue projections between $650 million and $700 million. Despite its potential, Cramer implies that other investment opportunities, particularly in AI, currently offer better upside and less risk.

feed.title: Verisk And S&P Climate Data Deal Tests Valuation And Growth Story
feed.summary: Verisk Analytics has partnered with S&P Global Energy to launch a new solution for quantifying insured and uninsured losses from climate and natural catastrophe events. This collaboration aims to assist insurers and financial institutions with regulatory compliance, portfolio stress testing, and climate risk reporting. While the deal strengthens Verisk's position in climate risk analytics, the company's valuation and the solution's adoption rate will be key factors for investors.

feed.title: How Investors Are Reacting To Weyerhaeuser (WY) Strategic Land Pivot And Boardroom Refresh
feed.summary: Weyerhaeuser (WY) announced a new Strategic Land Solutions segment, unveiled two engineered wood flooring products (Trus Joist ProPanel and AeroStrand LSL), and added Rick Beckwitt to its board compensation committee in February 2026. These moves aim to refine the company's portfolio and governance around land, wood products, and climate opportunities. While these changes are significant, the article notes that the investment narrative still largely hinges on cyclical lumber pricing and housing demand, with long-term forecasts projecting notable revenue and earnings growth by 2028.

feed.title: Verisk And S&P Climate Data Deal Tests Valuation And Growth Story
feed.summary: Verisk Analytics has partnered with S&P Global Energy to launch a new solution that quantifies insured and uninsured losses from future climate and natural catastrophe events. This collaboration aims to help insurers and financial institutions with regulatory compliance, stress testing, and climate risk reporting. While the deal could strengthen Verisk's position in the climate data market, investors are advised to monitor its adoption, revenue impact, and Verisk's debt levels given its current valuation.

feed.title: All Cruise Lines Impacted by Middle East Tensions So Far
feed.summary: The escalating military conflict in Iran and the Middle East is significantly impacting the cruise industry, leading to rerouted itineraries and cancelled sailings. Several cruise lines, including MSC Cruises, TUI Cruises, Celestyal Cruises, and Aroya Cruises, have had their ships forced to remain in port or cancel upcoming departures due to widespread airspace closures and heightened security concerns. This article details the specific impacts on each cruise line and advises guests to stay informed of further updates.

feed.title: Brown And Brown Taps Dori Henderson To Drive Technology And AI Shift
feed.summary: Brown & Brown has appointed Dorothea "Dori" Henderson as Chief Information Technology Officer to lead the company's enterprise technology strategy and digital transformation. This move signals the insurance brokerage's increased focus on technology, AI, data, and cybersecurity as core operational elements. Her role will be critical for operational efficiency, product delivery, and how the company competes in an evolving market.
